data.title: Serbia Travel Stories
data.meta_description: Discover amazing travel experiences in Serbia with Lonely Planet's insider tips, inspirational traveler stories and expert guidance from around the world.

Sep 30, 2019 • 5 min read

There are many fascinating Spomeniks - Yugoslav socialist-era monuments - in and around Belgrade. Here's our guide to visiting these works of art.
